title: Gangplank
body:
I understand that Gangplank is dead but I have the Ghost skin so why can't i play him. It would be greatly appreciated if you would sort out this bug quickly. 

Thanks, 
Tim

replies.body: M...maybe that's just a Halloween costume and he's not actually a ghost?
What's next? Your gonna tell me Santa doesn't exist?
Nah it's because he's not actually dead so coming back as a ghost makes no sense! :P
The new ghost skin is also worse. It's no longer translucent.

i think theyre going to replace him with another champ and for skins they with either refund them or give you a skin for the champ they replace him with (i have no evidence of this its just what i think will happen)

Wait so would we get a re fund on gangplank?? cause i actually really liked him and his old char i actually won battles with his slow/poison and effectively was able to go head to head with others i even got my first penta with him T-T
